title: ‘Plandemic’: Was Judy Mikovits Arrested Without a Warrant and Jailed Without Charges?
subtitle: The factually-challenged film “Plandemic” is a social media hit with groups such as anti-vaxxers and QAnon conspiracy theorists.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Researcher Judy Mikovits was arrested without a warrant and jailed without charges for making a controversial scientific discovery.
